file_content.text: I'm here to claim the bounty on this Republic scientist, name's Albea.
Albea, you say? One moment... yes--here, wanted dead, you certainly fulfilled that part. Give me a moment to verify her identity.
Very good. Here's your dispensation. Now if you don't mind, I need to call for someone to clean this up.
I'm sorry, but I've got about a thousand 67-E requisition forms to review before the day's out.
